text: E jenumanja achimisyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito)! Pamasile pam'bichilile Ntenga Jwetu (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwaakunsalichisya wanganyammwe pandema jakulechesya (kwika) achimitenga, kuti kasin'ja kuwecheta (yanti): “Nganatuichilila nkutagulila abali jakusengwasya namuno nkutetela.” Sano pamasile pam'bichilile nkutagulila abali jakusengwasya soni nkutetela, soni Allah pachindu chilichose awele Jwakombola
